Nirmal Kanagasabai - MSc CS @ McGill University

About

I am actively seeking Summer Internship 2017. If you are interested, please look at [my resume](https://nirmalkanagasabai.github.io/public/Nirmal_Kanagasabai.pdf) and shoot me an email.

  • I am currently pursuing M.Sc. Computer Science @ McGill University
  • I am also working as a Graduate Research Assistant at the Software Engineering Lab, McGill University which is headed by Prof. Joerg Kienzle
  • I am also working as a Teaching Assistant for COMP 361 - Software Engineering Project

Previously, I worked as a Systems Engineer at Infosys Ltd, the second largest Indian IT company operating world-wide for about 2 years. I did my Bachelors in Information Technology at Pondicherry Engineering College which is affiliated to Pondicherry University.
